scripting_h.help1Txt1: The Axis product provides an advanced function that allows users to customize and use their own scripts. This function is very powerful and improper use may render the product unusable.
scripting_h.help1Txt2: If the editing of a script does cause problems, the only course of action will then be to reset the product to its factory default settings.
scripting_h.help1Txt3: Axis strongly recommends that you do not use this function unless you fully understand the consequences.
scripting_h.help1Txt4: For more information on scripting, please see the Axis Developer web.
